lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: When the brothers returned to Egypt, what brother went that didn't go the first time?
When Joseph invited the brothers to his house for a meal, how did they feel? Why?
answers: Frightened, thought Joseph would make them slaves
Angry because they wanted to go home

questions.text: What unusual things happened at the meal?
answers: The brothers were seated oldest to youngest; Benjamin was given five times more
Only Benjamin was allowed to eat
The food ran out before they finished

questions.text: Before the brothers left, what did Joseph have placed in their bags?
answers: Money in each brother's sack; his silver cup placed in Benjamin's bag

questions.text: When the servant accused them of stealing Joseph's cup, what did the brothers say?
answers: If you find it, kill that person; the rest of us will become your slaves
We will pay double for the cup

questions.text: What did Judah say to Joseph?
answers: Make me a slave in place of Benjamin
Send all of us to prison

questions.text: After hearing Judah speak, what did Joseph do?
answers: Told the brothers who he was
Ordered the guards to arrest them

questions.text: How did the brothers feel when Joseph revealed who he was? Why?
answers: Afraid that he might want revenge

questions.text: When he saw his brothers were scared, what did Joseph say?
answers: God has sent me here to save people
What you did to me was no big deal

questions.text: What did Joseph want his brothers to tell his father?
answers: Bring the entire family to live with me in Egypt
Do not tell my father anything
